result.arabic_text: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
result.translation: Tubishatse twabamanurira igitangaza giturutse mu kirere, maze amajosi yabo agahora acyicishijeho bugufi (baba babishaka cyangwa batabishaka, ariko nta we dushaka guhatira kwemera).
